item.title: Unity - C# Advanced Practices + Tips and Tricks
item.description: This guide is ever-growing! There are hundreds of practices, cheats, tips and tricks within Unity - way too many to document in one go! This guide will updated over time, and students are welcome to contribute to it! Last updated: 13.02.25 Feel like you are familiar with C# scripting and want to tak...

item.title: Unity - C# and Scripting Resources
item.description: Learning to code can seem daunting, but the only way to get better is through exposure! There are thousands of tutorials online all with unique learning styles.
